// Contest: ClashCredenz, Team name: javacpp
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;
 
int main(){
    int m,n,sum=0,i,temp;
	bool flag=true;
    scanf("%d %d",&m,&n);
	sum=(n+1)/2;
    for(i=1;i<=m;i++)
		{scanf("%d",&temp);if(temp>sum){flag=false;} }
		if(flag)printf("YES");
		else printf("NO");
    
return 0;
}
